parameters: clear_all_weathers

\N<Ryuda Soldier>The people of this town are lucky. Some towns have been
massacred without question. Be thankful to Lord Zuuteruka.
clear_all_weathers
<ActiveMessage:\C[1]■EV発生■>
\N<Segi>Mr. Rozaro.
\N<Rozaro>Miss Segi... I've heard about Yuia.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Rozaro>You must be worried, it must be painful for you. I can
painfully understand your feelings.

\N<Rozaro>But... more importantly, is it true that you will be
participating in the training soldiers' assembly in place of
Yuia?
\N<Segi>Why do you know that...

\N<Rozaro>Normally, the participants of the training soldiers'
assembly are not publicly disclosed. Naturally, the matter
concerning you has not been known to the townspeople.

\N<Rozaro>However... your participation must have been quite unusual,
as I overheard the soldiers from Ryuda bragging about it in
the tavern.

\N<Rozaro>I cornered one of those men... and after a bit of pressure,
that Ryuda soldier gave me the information.
\N<Rozaro>From the looks of it... is it really true?

\N<Segi>Yes... I intend to do so. It's the only way to save Lord
Yuia and Riia.

\N<Rozaro>I see... You must be resolved to face this with all your
might. Understood, I won't try to stop you now. At least
allow me to pray for your safety.
\N<Rozaro>And... does Riia know about your decision?

\N<Segi>No... I haven't informed my son. Even if he can't understand
the situation, telling him would only cause unnecessary
anxiety.

\N<Rozaro>Hmm... that's probably for the best. I'll also keep this
matter from the boy.

\N<Segi>I appreciate that. Mr. Rozaro, please continue to look after
Riia for me.

\N<Rozaro>...Yes. Whatever I can do, I'll lend my strength. I'll be
staying at the tavern for a while. Feel free to come and ask
for me anytime.
A
\N<Segi>Ah...!
\N<Red Cap Boy>Be careful, lady!

\N<Segi>I wonder... That kid just now. He seemed to be in quite a
hurry...
B

\N<Woman>It's widely rumored that not a single plant remains where
the people of Ryuda have passed...

\N<Woman>Of course, it must be an exaggerated rumor, but even so, I
worry about the future of this town...

\N<Man>That management office used to be quite literally the nerve
center of the city.

\N<Man>Well... now it's completely turned into the administrative
governing body for the Ryuda troops stationed in this
town...

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Inside is Lord Zuuteruka, the town's garrison manager. Be
very careful about how you speak.
